title: River
lyrics:
We can be a river
Fill a new sea
Mother river
Alive in me
We can be a river

Fill a new sea

Mother river

Alive in me



We can be a river

Fill a new sea

Mother river

Alive in me



We can be a...





Don't make it hard to see

Natural unity

Don't make it hard to rise above

Our sense of indignity



I'll fall in with you;

Fall in with me

Moving along through the world

Why have you fought me?



We can be a river

Fill a new sea

Mother river

Alive in me



We can be a river

Fill a new sea

Mother river

Alive in me
